subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Capt & Detective,

Lane county let us know that location F056 on your Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c58296693bdd69ebd37c4fb017a7257e3a0b828428fc12d0e3ef55702a4ea88a5d4a59819ea658d686238b0c42d6c8a20081  actually falls in ODOT ROW. Therefore we have update the placement to a location that our records show as city ROW. Can you please review F056 on your plan and let me know if you approve of the placement?

Regards
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 


On Wed, May 21, 2025 at 8:55?AM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:


	Captain Burke,

	Would be best to continue to work with me since the tech is in the field and likely not available a good portion of each day. All locations can be reviewed on the Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c58280b6a18b7fdeb55baf52a3ffb65739382cab3c1af4825993a62a45ad85b0685d4ef6ebb168a91a528edb328114a85096 . Without a plat map I cannot say for sure which locations are on existing poles that fall in ODOT ROW. However based on what is and is not installed yet, he should look at locations F038 & F039 to start

	If we have ODOT approval we just need confirmation on which cameras this covers and then the confirmation that ODOT has approved us installing at these locations to save for our records. Once we have these couple of things we can push them forward to install.

	Please let me know if you have any questions.

	Regards
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 


	On Wed, May 21, 2025 at 8:45?AM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Matt, 

		 

		Can your tech work with Bret to confirm the locations and required approval for install?  Either that or can you send me a list of the locations, and I will forward to Bret?

		 

		 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401

		(541) 682-5895 work

		 



		From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 1:38 PM
		To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
		Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

		 

		[EXTERNAL ?]

		Capt & Detective,

		 

		If Bret could review the locations and confirm which ODOT approved, that would be helpful. We would also need something in writing from ODOT stating they have given us this permission. This is a great step forward if they will approve of us installing on infrastructure that falls in their ROW but what is existing is owned by someone else.

		 

		Honestly, it is really up to the tech on how much they communicate with you outside of working ahead of time to arrange TC or to notify customers of their ETA. Feel free to connect with them if you have already built up a relationship.  

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

		 

		 

		On Tue, May 20, 2025 at 8:35?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			I have reviewed the locations in the Deployment Plan and approved them.  The install has gone smoothly, and I have been in contact with both tech�s.

			 

			Derek

			 

			Detective D. DeWitt

			Financial Crimes Unit

			Special Weapons and Tactics Team

			Background Investigations Team

			Eugene Police Department

			300 County Club Road

			Eugene, OR 97401

			Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

			Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

			Work Cell � 541-743-6192

			 

			

			 

			From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Monday, May 19, 2025 3:12 PM
			To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
			Cc: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >; matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com ; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
			Subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Hi Capt,

			 

			Happy Monday. Installs are proceeding smoothly and we are continuing to permit the couple of county locations and then the Lumen pole. You may review the locations on your Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5822ae2296284653fa515e4dda4b24a8687f2fad049777d6f8789bcfdae37ff7add1a0dbcf70d8641d38e490cb2a0dbb358 . Has everything gone well in regards to the coordination with the tech once he is there performing the installs?

			 

			Wanted to circle up on ODOT and see if there has been any recent communication with them about the few cameras that fall in their ROW. 

			 

			Please let me know if you have any questions.

			
			Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 

			 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/N8dQjWVQ3Zda.png> 

			 

			 

			On Wed, May 14, 2025 at 7:14?AM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

				Hi Capt,

				 

				This is good to hear. When the reach out is sent, can you please include myself and matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com  on the email? So that we are up to speed on those comms as they happen.

				 

				Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

				 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 

				 

				 

				On Tue, May 13, 2025 at 4:54?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					We have a pretty good relationship with Lumen related some significant cases we�ve worked with them.  Det. Johns has a contact.  I copied Det. Dewitt to this email and maybe we can reach out to Lumen to see if they will let us install on their pole.  If not, we can look at alternatives. 

					 

					 

					Jake Burke

					Captain � Investigations Division

					Eugene Police Department

					300 Country Club Road

					Eugene, Oregon 97401

					(541) 682-5895 work

					 

					 

					

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Tuesday, May 13, 2025 2:50 PM
					To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
					Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com 
					Subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Hi Capt. Burke & Bret,

					 

					We connected with Caitlin and learned that this pole is owned by Lumen. She did not have much confidence that they would approve of us installing on their pole so she shared some alternates.

					 

					The first attachment shows the nearest EWEB owned pole (the yellow marker is the Lumen pole). They also have poles out on hwy 99 if you wanted to explore that route but this circled pole is the closest pole to our current location so wanted to get this one in front of you first. Please let me know if you want to proceed with this pole. If you do I will get your Deployment Plan updated and then we will re engage with Caitlin.

					 

					The second attachment shows the other EWEB poles in red with notes indicating which ones are actually owned by Lumen

					 

					Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 

					 

					 

					On Mon, May 12, 2025 at 8:40?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					Caitlin Tennent Caitlin.Tennent@EWEB.ORG Caitlin.Tennent@EWEB.ORG 

					541-685-7414

					 

					I would start with Caitlin.

					 

					Bret Jones

					Traffic Operations

					City of Eugene

					O:541-682-4908

					C:541-228-5722

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Monday, May 12, 2025 8:37 AM
					To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
					Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com 
					Subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					The utility pole. We do not install on speed limit signs and the red line indicator is not always exact.

					
					

					Do you have a contact we can reach out to about permission to mount on this pole?

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 

					 

					 

					On Mon, May 12, 2025 at 8:11?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					Are you showing the utility pole or the speed limit sign?

					 

					Bret Jones

					Traffic Operations

					City of Eugene

					O:541-682-4908

					C:541-228-5722

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Monday, May 12, 2025 8:04 AM
					To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
					Cc: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >; matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com 
					Subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Attached is a screenshot of the pole in question for reference.

					
					

	
 
IkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=q79WzWJpd4nTCQuACnV2pZFZSnx3cz5T3h6KN1Q4EC4%3D&reserved=0> 																		
																		
Matt Triana																		
Project Manager
